org.codehaus.mojo.versions.filtering

Packages that use org.codehaus.mojo.versions.filtering
Package
Description
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.filtering
 
  • Classes in org.codehaus.mojo.versions.filtering used by org.codehaus.mojo.versions.filtering
    Class
    Description
    DependencyFilter
    Provides a dependency matcher based on the list of strings of groupId[:artifactId[:version[:type[:classifier[:scope]]]]] for matching dependencies.
    TokenizedMatcher
    Predicate that matches a Dependency against a colon-separated pattern.
    TokenizedMatcher.Tokens
    The tokens that may be used in a pattern.
    WildcardMatcher
    A simple "matcher" object providing a utility whether the given string matches a pattern consisting of strings containing the wildcard (*) character.
